Eventually, since there's NOTHING WRONG with the vehicle, I'll have the tires replaced, but it WON'T be at the dealership!  Contrary to how it probable appears, I am NOT a criticizer, but I worked in Customer Service for many, many years, and I feel I am PAYING for care.
